Jazz vs Rockets best bets

Jazz vs Rockets best bet: Rockets -13 (-110)

The Rockets have been dominant at home this season and are expected to roll past the rebuilding Jazz. Houston's defense has been suffocating opponents all month.

Jazz vs Rockets best bet: Under 220.5 (-115)

Both teams play at a slow pace and this total seems inflated given the defensive prowess of the Rockets.

  • Spread: Jazz +13 (-110) | Rockets -13 (-110)
  • Moneyline: Jazz +575 | Rockets -850
  • Over/Under: Over 220.5 (-110) | Under 220.5 (-110)
